briefdescription.para: Speed presets for encoding with different performance/quality tradeoffs.
Helper template function to clamp a field value between minimum and maximum values.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the field (typically int)
Reference to the field to be clamped

briefdescription.para: Configuration parameters and settings for AVIF encoding.

detaileddescription.para:
ConvAvif Developer
2025
This file defines the configuration structures and enums that control the AVIF encoding process, including codec selection, quality settings, and various encoder-specific parameters.
